column5: Hey traveler! This listing is for a spacious bedroom. It has a queen size mattress, closet, and shared bathroom. There's also a theater room, large backyard with a pool, hot tub, and space to hangout! The house is in a quiet neighborhood and just minutes away from shops, and 15 minutes from Downtown Dallas.
column8: Comfy room. Close to DART, downtown/uptown (T)
